LanguageData.InstallInstinctLimiter.label: install sapiostore mesh
LanguageData.PM_TagAnimal.label: tag animal
LanguageData.PM_TagAnimal.description: tag genetic material from an animal
LanguageData.Make_GenekitColorPicker.label: fabricate dermal repigmentation genekit
LanguageData.Make_GenekitColorPicker.description: Reshape mechanites into a dermal repigmentation genekit.
LanguageData.Make_Slurry.label: make slurry from mutagens
LanguageData.Make_Slurry.description: Make slurry using mechanites from different mutagens.
LanguageData.Make_SlurryBulk.label: make slurry from mutagens x4
LanguageData.Make_SlurryBulk.description: Make slurry using mechanites from different mutagens.
LanguageData.Make_ComponentsFromSlurry.label: fabricate components
LanguageData.Make_ResurrectorFromMutonite.label: fabricate reincarnator mech serum
LanguageData.Make_ResurrectorFromMutonite.description: Reshape mechanites into a reincarnator serum from slurry. Caution, this may have unintended side-effects being made from mutagenic mechanites.
LanguageData.Make_HealerFromMutonite.label: fabricate mutagenic healer mech serum
LanguageData.Make_HealerFromMutonite.description: Reprogram a large quantity of mutagenic mechanites with healer protocols. Due to the sheer number of mechanites being reprogrammed, a few mechanites will fail to be neutralised and there is a high probability that the restored areas will be mutated as a result.
LanguageData.Make_GlitterMedsFromMutonite.label: fabricate glitterworld medicine
LanguageData.Make_GlitterMedsFromMutonite.description: Reshape mechanites into glitterworld medicine from antigen. This does require quite a lot.
LanguageData.AdministerMutagenicMechSerumHealer.label: administer mutagenic healer mech serum
LanguageData.AdministerMutagenicMechSerumHealer.descr: Administer a mutagenic healer mech serum.
LanguageData.PMMake_Hazsilk.label: make hazsilk
LanguageData.PMMake_Hazsilk.description: Turn cloth into hazsilk using antigen.
LanguageData.PMMake_HazsilkBulk.label: make hazsilk x4
LanguageData.PMMake_HazsilkBulk.description: Turn cloth into hazsilk using antigen.
LanguageData.PMMake_Morphsilk.label: make morphsilk
LanguageData.PMMake_Morphsilk.description: Turn cloth into morphskilk using mechanite slurry.
LanguageData.PMMake_MorphsilkBulk.label: make morphsilk x4
LanguageData.PMMake_MorphsilkBulk.description: Turn cloth into morphskilk using mechanite slurry.
LanguageData.PM_ApplyHaltCream.label: apply halt cream
LanguageData.PM_ApplyHaltCream.description: Apply halt cream to a mutation
LanguageData.PM_ApplyAdaptionCream.label: apply adaption cream
LanguageData.PM_ApplyAdaptionCream.description: Apply adaption cream to a mutation
